title: 12/31/21 DPS Hour 3 Rob Parker & TJ Houshmandzadeh talk Baseball Hall of Fame
itunes:title: 12/31/21 DPS Hour 3 Rob Parker & TJ Houshmandzadeh talk Baseball Hall of Fame
description:
Rob & TJ talk about who deserves to be elected to the baseball Hall of Fame, as this year’s ballots are due tonight, will we finally see Barry Bonds and Roger Clemens elected this year? Yahoo Senior NFL Reporter Charles Robinson joins the show as Vikings QB Kirk Cousins tests positive for COVID and will miss Sunday’s must-win against the Packers, and will Kyrie Irving disrupt the Nets chemistry as he makes his return?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
